attributes.title: gen z is more powerful
attributes.review: in conclusion gen z is more powerful than the orange peel we tend to listen too.also he’s racist too. seriously? the Chinese virus? the wall? obviously not supporting the blm movement? he’s doing awful things to the country and we’re going ✨downhill✨and we’re going to ✨wipe out✨and it’s his fault. not all cops are bad, but lots of cops are and his orders for them don’t help. cops are basically saying “don’t treat us the way you treat you” by saying they’re oppressed. they look incredibly stupid saying that. they chose to be a cop. no one chose the color of their skin. and trump hasn’t done anything about it.

attributes.title: This App..
attributes.review: This app is helping people who should be in jail. It is promoting rape and assault AND predatory actions. It is also very difficult to use due to the obnoxious amount of ingorance that the app holds

attributes.title: This app made me poop myself
attributes.review: It asked me for a lot of my personal information like my phone number so I got scared and hid in my bathroom and pooped myself and the FBI showed up at my house and ate my cat I was so mad that I walked up to the FBI and said let me talk to your manager like the Karen I am so trump showed up at my house and I got a new cat but the cat was a under cover cat spy PEROID.

attributes.title: Non-Christian Snowflake ❄️✨
attributes.review: Absolutely horrid. I spent twenty minutes on the app trying to support MY president in the upcoming elections (who needs sleepy joe anyways) and my phone completely shut down ☹️. Very disappointed President Trump. Your people deserve better! Not to mention how the app collects more personal information about you up front than that tiky tokky app hes trying to get rid of. Now, Mr.President I know we need to defend against those communists but my granddaughter loves that app, Melinda does little dances and it’s part of her daily routine. You’re taking away her childhood because you’re afraid of China??? Give me a break! We’re Americans. God will protect us. Overall, Leave us and our children alone!
